original_text: And Josiah removed all the shrines also of the high places that were in the cities of Samaria, which kings of Israel had made, provoking the Lord to anger. He did to them according to all that he had done at Bethel.
korean_text: 전에 이스라엘 여러 왕이 사마리아 각 성읍에 지어서 여호와를 격노하게 한 산당을 요시야가 다 제거하되 벧엘에서 행한 모든 일대로 행하고

sentences.original_text: And Josiah removed all the shrines also of the high places
that were in the cities of Samaria
which kings of Israel had made
according to all that he had done at Bethel.
